title: Poster, 1997-19-163, 1972–76
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in black lower left corner: Directeurs artistiques: Georges Huel et Pierre-Yves Pelletier  Graphistes: Yvon Larouche, Pierre-Yves Pelletier et Guy Saint-Arnaud
inscribed: Imprinted in red upper left corner the registrered logo of the Olympic Games. Imprinted in black lower left corner: Copyright 1972, COJO 76. Litho Canada
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Dan Friedman
description: A black, highly stylized, flat graphic shape of a beaver is at the center of the sheet. A rainbow band runs across the animal's body from left to right. Presented on a white background. In black at upper center, Montréal 1976.
